title: Random moments of disconnection/lag that lasts about 3~5 seconds
body:
I've never had problem with LoL before. But since yesterday, I've being having random moments of unresponsiveness where I can't move my character, and some times I would just disconnect for a brief moment (with the little blinking "reconnecting..." bar). 

Has anyone encountered the same issue? Do you know why this is?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds like packet loss to me, could you do the following.

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and a link to your ICSI netalyzr results.
